text: Day 782: Russia-Ukraine War Updates 🇺🇦⚔️🇷🇺1. Intensified shelling in Eastern Ukraine continues to threaten civilian lives.2. Diplomatic efforts stalled as international community demands a ceasefire.3. Humanitarian aid reaches isolated regions, alleviating some hardship.4. Calls for accountability grow louder as war crimes investigations proceed.5. Global economic impact felt as sanctions on Russia disrupt energy markets.We stand with Ukraine and its people in their fight for sovereignty, justice, and peace. ✊🕊️
